content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":262012,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どこかの異界を通じて、世界中の別のコンピューターと連絡を取り合っているようだ","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems that through some otherworldly dimension, it is communicating with other computers around the world."},{"lineNumber":262013,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この娘の話では、このコンピューター自体は正常だそうだから","translatedEnglishLine":"According to this girl, the computer itself is functioning normally."},{"lineNumber":262014,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この異界ゲートを通った先にある異界で何か事故が起こっているのだろう","translatedEnglishLine":"There must have been some kind of accident in the otherworld beyond this otherworld gate."},{"lineNumber":262015,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・わからん、で、どうすればいい","translatedEnglishLine":"...I don't understand. So, what should we do?"},{"lineNumber":262016,"originalJapaneseLine":"直接、その異界にいって確かめてみるしかなかろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"We have no choice but to go directly to that otherworld and check it out."},{"lineNumber":262017,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんな事が出来るのて驚くコンピューター娘","translatedEnglishLine":"The computer girl is surprised that such a thing is even possible."},{"lineNumber":262018,"originalJapaneseLine":"コンピューターの事は分からんが、魔法の事なら私に分からない事はない","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't understand computers, but when it comes to magic, there's nothing I don't understand."},{"lineNumber":262019,"originalJapaneseLine":"異界ゲートオープン","translatedEnglishLine":"Otherworld Gate Open"},{"lineNumber":262020,"originalJapaneseLine":"コンピュータールームに異界ゲートが開く","translatedEnglishLine":"An otherworld gate opens in the computer room."},{"lineNumber":262021,"originalJapaneseLine":"さぁ、いこうか","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, shall we go?"},{"lineNumber":262022,"originalJapaneseLine":"異界ゲートを通った中・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Passing through the otherworld gate..."},{"lineNumber":262023,"originalJapaneseLine":"背景：サイバーワールド","translatedEnglishLine":"Background: Cyber World"},{"lineNumber":262024,"originalJapaneseLine":"始めてくる異界だ、そうだな、サイバーワールドと名付けよう","translatedEnglishLine":"This is the first otherworld we've come to. Yes, let's name it Cyber World."},{"lineNumber":262025,"originalJapaneseLine":"パケット（キャラ指定を確認）が箱を持って飛び回っている","translatedEnglishLine":"Packets (confirm character specification) are flying around carrying boxes."},{"lineNumber":262026,"originalJapaneseLine":"上下左右ない不思議な空間","translatedEnglishLine":"A strange space with no up, down, left or right."},{"lineNumber":262027,"originalJapaneseLine":"よくわからんが、とにかく動いてみよう","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't really understand it, but let's try moving around anyway."},{"lineNumber":262028,"originalJapaneseLine":"パケットが箱を持って走っていると、ノートンガツが止めて箱を潰します。","translatedEnglishLine":"When a packet carrying a box runs by, a Norton Guts stops it and crushes the box."},{"lineNumber":262029,"originalJapaneseLine":"ん、仲間割れか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Hm, is this a quarrel among allies...?"},{"lineNumber":262030,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、違う・・あのタイプが箱みたいなモンスターを一方的に刈っているようですね","translatedEnglishLine":"No, that's not it... That type seems to be unilaterally slashing those monster-like boxes."},{"lineNumber":262031,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ・・こっちみた","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah... it looked this way."},{"lineNumber":262032,"originalJapaneseLine":"ノートンガツ・・ランス達を見て少し考える","translatedEnglishLine":"The Norton Guts looks at Rance and the others and thinks for a moment."},{"lineNumber":262033,"originalJapaneseLine":"ウィルススキャン中みたいな待ち時間","translatedEnglishLine":"A waiting time like during a virus scan."},{"lineNumber":262034,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達をウィルスと判断、攻撃してきた","translatedEnglishLine":"It judged Rance and the others as viruses and attacked."},{"lineNumber":262035,"originalJapaneseLine":"今のはなんだ・・・わからんが、我々を敵として見ているのに違いないだろう","translatedEnglishLine":"What was that just now... I don't know, but it's definitely treating us as enemies."},{"lineNumber":262036,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっちこっちにいそうだぞ、用心して進もう","translatedEnglishLine":"It looks like there are more of them around. Let's proceed cautiously."},{"lineNumber":262037,"originalJapaneseLine":"あまり広くない世界だな、なるほど・・そういう仕組みか","translatedEnglishLine":"It's not a very large world. I see... so that's how it works."},{"lineNumber":262038,"originalJapaneseLine":"小さな元の世界と繋がった穴がある、それは各コンピューターが開けている穴","translatedEnglishLine":"There are holes connected to the small original world; those holes are opened by each computer."},{"lineNumber":262039,"originalJapaneseLine":"たぶん、この近くあっても遠いゼスやヘルマンからの穴かもしれない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Probably holes leading from Zeth and Herman, which are far away even if nearby here."},{"lineNumber":262040,"originalJapaneseLine":"ようは距離を超えた空間なので","translatedEnglishLine":"In short, it's a space that transcends distance."},{"lineNumber":262041,"originalJapaneseLine":"この変な生き物が荷物を穴かな穴へ運ぶ事で情報伝達をしていようだな","translatedEnglishLine":"These strange creatures seem to be transporting cargo through the holes to transmit information."},{"lineNumber":262042,"originalJapaneseLine":"それをあのモンスターが襲って破壊しているので情報が伝わらなかったり、壊れたりするのか","translatedEnglishLine":"Because that monster attacks and destroys them, the information may not get through or gets corrupted."},{"lineNumber":262043,"originalJapaneseLine":"パケットを１匹捕まえた、中の箱を開けてみた。","translatedEnglishLine":"I caught one packet and tried opening the box inside."},{"lineNumber":262044,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだ字が浮かび上がってきたぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"What is this? Words are appearing."},{"lineNumber":262045,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ｆｒｏｍ　リーザス帝国","translatedEnglishLine":"from Rizas Empire"},{"lineNumber":262046,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ｔｏ　　　総統府","translatedEnglishLine":"to the Headquarters"},{"lineNumber":262047,"originalJapaneseLine":"　軍事情報、今の兵力、どの地点で戦いがあるとか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Military information: current troop strength, locations of battles, and so on..."},{"lineNumber":262048,"originalJapaneseLine":"すごい量のデータ、ほう・・こういうデータが流れているのか","translatedEnglishLine":"An incredible amount of data. Hmm... So this kind of data is flowing here."},{"lineNumber":262049,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":262050,"originalJapaneseLine":"別の一匹を捕まえてみる","translatedEnglishLine":"I caught another one."},{"lineNumber":262051,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ｆｒｏｍ　マジノライン第６地区、第１７砲台","translatedEnglishLine":"from Maginot Line District 6, 17th Battery"},{"lineNumber":262052,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ｔｏ　　　ゼス司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"to Zeth Command Headquarters"},{"lineNumber":262053,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　定期報告　１＝破損　２＝破損　３＝情報取れず　４＝情報取れず","translatedEnglishLine":"Regular report: 1=Damaged, 2=Damaged, 3=No info obtained, 4=No info obtained"},{"lineNumber":262054,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　ＸＸ月ｘｘ日、ＸＸＸ時ＸＸＸ分ＸＸＸ秒","translatedEnglishLine":"XX month xx day, XXX hour XXX minute XXX second"},{"lineNumber":262055,"originalJapaneseLine":"うーん、なんかどうでもいいのもあるな","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, some of this seems trivial."},{"lineNumber":262056,"originalJapaneseLine":"別のパケットを捕まえた、中を覗こうとしたら開かない","translatedEnglishLine":"I caught another packet; when I tried to peek inside, it wouldn't open."},{"lineNumber":262057,"originalJapaneseLine":"これは開かないな、パスワードを要求されてだ","translatedEnglishLine":"This one won't open; it's asking for a password."},{"lineNumber":262058,"originalJapaneseLine":"うむむ、わからん。ぽい","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh, I don't understand. Seems like it."},{"lineNumber":262059,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここはなんだ、大量の箱が積んで居るぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"What is this place? There is a huge stack of boxes."},{"lineNumber":262060,"originalJapaneseLine":"開けてみるとハイパービルのとある部屋の写真、同じ写真がいっぱい","translatedEnglishLine":"When opened, it’s a photo of a certain room in the Hyper Building, many copies of the same photo."},{"lineNumber":262061,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだこれは・・・日付が書いている事が分かる","translatedEnglishLine":"What is this... I can tell there are dates written on them."},{"lineNumber":262062,"originalJapaneseLine":"もしかしてこれその日の写真ですかね、３０分置にありますよ、何年分もあるのでしょうかすごい量です","translatedEnglishLine":"Could these be photos from each day? They're taken every 30 minutes. I wonder if this is data spanning years; it's an amazing amount."},{"lineNumber":262063,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんでこんなのを置いているんだ、意味不明だ","translatedEnglishLine":"Why keep something like this here? It makes no sense."},{"lineNumber":262064,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ、これは別の場所の写真だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, this is a photo of another location."},{"lineNumber":262065,"originalJapaneseLine":"パイアールの過去が分かります","translatedEnglishLine":"It reveals Pyarr's past."},{"lineNumber":262066,"originalJapaneseLine":"姉ルートの話、姉の為に魔人になった","translatedEnglishLine":"The story of the sister route; he became a demon for his sister."},{"lineNumber":262067,"originalJapaneseLine":"日記はすごい量です、こんなの読んでられないと思ったらまとめデータがあった","translatedEnglishLine":"There is an enormous amount of diary entries. Just when I thought I couldn't read all of this, there was summary data."},{"lineNumber":262068,"originalJapaneseLine":"パイアールの過去が分かります","translatedEnglishLine":"It reveals Pyarr's past."},{"lineNumber":262069,"originalJapaneseLine":"姉を復活させる為の試行錯誤、コンピューター、サイバーワールドと繋げたのもパイアール","translatedEnglishLine":"The trials and errors to resurrect his sister, and also connecting to the computer and Cyber World were done by Pyarr."},{"lineNumber":262070,"originalJapaneseLine":"パイアールの最新日記","translatedEnglishLine":"Pyarr's latest diary entry."},{"lineNumber":262071,"originalJapaneseLine":"最近、人類が使っているデータ量が増えた、ある程度は許容していたが邪魔だから排除する事にした","translatedEnglishLine":"Recently, the amount of data humans use has increased. To some extent, I tolerated it, but since it's troublesome, I decided to eliminate it."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこかの異界を通じて、世界中の別のコンピューターと連絡を取り合っているようだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems that through some otherworldly dimension, it is communicating with other computers around the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この娘の話では、このコンピューター自体は正常だそうだから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: According to this girl, the computer itself is functioning normally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この異界ゲートを通った先にある異界で何か事故が起こっているのだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There must have been some kind of accident in the otherworld beyond this otherworld gate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・わからん、で、どうすればいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...I don't understand. So, what should we do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 直接、その異界にいって確かめてみるしかなかろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have no choice but to go directly to that otherworld and check it out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな事が出来るのて驚くコンピューター娘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The computer girl is surprised that such a thing is even possible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンピューターの事は分からんが、魔法の事なら私に分からない事はない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't understand computers, but when it comes to magic, there's nothing I don't understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異界ゲートオープン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Otherworld Gate Open

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンピュータールームに異界ゲートが開く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An otherworld gate opens in the computer room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さぁ、いこうか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, shall we go?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異界ゲートを通った中・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Passing through the otherworld gate...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：サイバーワールド
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Cyber World

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 始めてくる異界だ、そうだな、サイバーワールドと名付けよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the first otherworld we've come to. Yes, let's name it Cyber World.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パケット（キャラ指定を確認）が箱を持って飛び回っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Packets (confirm character specification) are flying around carrying boxes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上下左右ない不思議な空間
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A strange space with no up, down, left or right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくわからんが、とにかく動いてみよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really understand it, but let's try moving around anyway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パケットが箱を持って走っていると、ノートンガツが止めて箱を潰します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When a packet carrying a box runs by, a Norton Guts stops it and crushes the box.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん、仲間割れか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hm, is this a quarrel among allies...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、違う・・あのタイプが箱みたいなモンスターを一方的に刈っているようですね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, that's not it... That type seems to be unilaterally slashing those monster-like boxes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ・・こっちみた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... it looked this way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ノートンガツ・・ランス達を見て少し考える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Norton Guts looks at Rance and the others and thinks for a moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウィルススキャン中みたいな待ち時間
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A waiting time like during a virus scan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達をウィルスと判断、攻撃してきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It judged Rance and the others as viruses and attacked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のはなんだ・・・わからんが、我々を敵として見ているのに違いないだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What was that just now... I don't know, but it's definitely treating us as enemies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっちこっちにいそうだぞ、用心して進もう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It looks like there are more of them around. Let's proceed cautiously.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまり広くない世界だな、なるほど・・そういう仕組みか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not a very large world. I see... so that's how it works.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小さな元の世界と繋がった穴がある、それは各コンピューターが開けている穴
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are holes connected to the small original world; those holes are opened by each computer.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たぶん、この近くあっても遠いゼスやヘルマンからの穴かもしれない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Probably holes leading from Zeth and Herman, which are far away even if nearby here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ようは距離を超えた空間なので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In short, it's a space that transcends distance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この変な生き物が荷物を穴かな穴へ運ぶ事で情報伝達をしていようだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These strange creatures seem to be transporting cargo through the holes to transmit information.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それをあのモンスターが襲って破壊しているので情報が伝わらなかったり、壊れたりするのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because that monster attacks and destroys them, the information may not get through or gets corrupted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パケットを１匹捕まえた、中の箱を開けてみた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I caught one packet and tried opening the box inside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ字が浮かび上がってきたぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What is this? Words are appearing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ｆｒｏｍ　リーザス帝国
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: from Rizas Empire

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ｔｏ　　　総統府
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to the Headquarters

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍事情報、今の兵力、どの地点で戦いがあるとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Military information: current troop strength, locations of battles, and so on...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごい量のデータ、ほう・・こういうデータが流れているのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An incredible amount of data. Hmm... So this kind of data is flowing here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別の一匹を捕まえてみる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I caught another one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ｆｒｏｍ　マジノライン第６地区、第１７砲台
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: from Maginot Line District 6, 17th Battery

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ｔｏ　　　ゼス司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to Zeth Command Headquarters

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 定期報告　１＝破損　２＝破損　３＝情報取れず　４＝情報取れず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Regular report: 1=Damaged, 2=Damaged, 3=No info obtained, 4=No info obtained

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸ月ｘｘ日、ＸＸＸ時ＸＸＸ分ＸＸＸ秒
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: XX month xx day, XXX hour XXX minute XXX second

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、なんかどうでもいいのもあるな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, some of this seems trivial.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別のパケットを捕まえた、中を覗こうとしたら開かない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I caught another packet; when I tried to peek inside, it wouldn't open.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは開かないな、パスワードを要求されてだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This one won't open; it's asking for a password.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむむ、わからん。ぽい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, I don't understand. Seems like it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここはなんだ、大量の箱が積んで居るぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What is this place? There is a huge stack of boxes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 開けてみるとハイパービルのとある部屋の写真、同じ写真がいっぱい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When opened, it’s a photo of a certain room in the Hyper Building, many copies of the same photo.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだこれは・・・日付が書いている事が分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What is this... I can tell there are dates written on them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしかしてこれその日の写真ですかね、３０分置にありますよ、何年分もあるのでしょうかすごい量です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could these be photos from each day? They're taken every 30 minutes. I wonder if this is data spanning years; it's an amazing amount.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでこんなのを置いているんだ、意味不明だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why keep something like this here? It makes no sense.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、これは別の場所の写真だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, this is a photo of another location.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールの過去が分かります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It reveals Pyarr's past.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姉ルートの話、姉の為に魔人になった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The story of the sister route; he became a demon for his sister.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日記はすごい量です、こんなの読んでられないと思ったらまとめデータがあった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is an enormous amount of diary entries. Just when I thought I couldn't read all of this, there was summary data.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールの過去が分かります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It reveals Pyarr's past.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姉を復活させる為の試行錯誤、コンピューター、サイバーワールドと繋げたのもパイアール
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The trials and errors to resurrect his sister, and also connecting to the computer and Cyber World were done by Pyarr.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールの最新日記
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pyarr's latest diary entry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最近、人類が使っているデータ量が増えた、ある程度は許容していたが邪魔だから排除する事にした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Recently, the amount of data humans use has increased. To some extent, I tolerated it, but since it's troublesome, I decided to eliminate it.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

I see... so that's how it works."},{"lineNumber":262038,"originalJapaneseLine":"小さな元の世界と繋がった穴がある、それは各コンピューターが開けている穴","translatedEnglishLine":"There are holes connected to the small original world; those holes are opened by each computer."},{"lineNumber":262039,"originalJapaneseLine":"たぶん、この近くあっても遠いゼスやヘルマンからの穴かもしれない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Probably holes leading from Zeth and Herman, which are far away even if nearby here."},{"lineNumber":262040,"originalJapaneseLine":"ようは距離を超えた空間なので","translatedEnglishLine":"In short, it's a space that transcends distance."},{"lineNumber":262041,"originalJapaneseLine":"この変な生き物が荷物を穴かな穴へ運ぶ事で情報伝達をしていようだな","translatedEnglishLine":"These strange creatures seem to be transporting cargo through the holes to transmit information."},{"lineNumber":262042,"originalJapaneseLine":"それをあのモンスターが襲って破壊しているので情報が伝わらなかったり、壊れたりするのか","translatedEnglishLine":"Because that monster attacks and destroys them, the information may not get through or gets corrupted."},{"lineNumber":262043,"originalJapaneseLine":"パケットを１匹捕まえた、中の箱を開けてみた。","translatedEnglishLine":"I caught one packet and tried opening the box inside."},{"lineNumber":262044,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだ字が浮かび上がってきたぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"What is this? To some extent, I tolerated it, but since it's troublesome, I decided to eliminate it."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこかの異界を通じて、世界中の別のコンピューターと連絡を取り合っているようだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems that through some otherworldly dimension, it is communicating with other computers around the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この娘の話では、このコンピューター自体は正常だそうだから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: According to this girl, the computer itself is functioning normally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この異界ゲートを通った先にある異界で何か事故が起こっているのだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There must have been some kind of accident in the otherworld beyond this otherworld gate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・わからん、で、どうすればいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...I don't understand. So, what should we do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 直接、その異界にいって確かめてみるしかなかろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have no choice but to go directly to that otherworld and check it out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな事が出来るのて驚くコンピューター娘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The computer girl is surprised that such a thing is even possible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンピューターの事は分からんが、魔法の事なら私に分からない事はない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't understand computers, but when it comes to magic, there's nothing I don't understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異界ゲートオープン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Otherworld Gate Open

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンピュータールームに異界ゲートが開く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An otherworld gate opens in the computer room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さぁ、いこうか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, shall we go?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異界ゲートを通った中・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Passing through the otherworld gate...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：サイバーワールド
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Cyber World

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 始めてくる異界だ、そうだな、サイバーワールドと名付けよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the first otherworld we've come to. Yes, let's name it Cyber World.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パケット（キャラ指定を確認）が箱を持って飛び回っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Packets (confirm character specification) are flying around carrying boxes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上下左右ない不思議な空間
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A strange space with no up, down, left or right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくわからんが、とにかく動いてみよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really understand it, but let's try moving around anyway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パケットが箱を持って走っていると、ノートンガツが止めて箱を潰します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When a packet carrying a box runs by, a Norton Guts stops it and crushes the box.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん、仲間割れか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hm, is this a quarrel among allies...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、違う・・あのタイプが箱みたいなモンスターを一方的に刈っているようですね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, that's not it... That type seems to be unilaterally slashing those monster-like boxes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ・・こっちみた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... it looked this way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ノートンガツ・・ランス達を見て少し考える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Norton Guts looks at Rance and the others and thinks for a moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウィルススキャン中みたいな待ち時間
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A waiting time like during a virus scan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達をウィルスと判断、攻撃してきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It judged Rance and the others as viruses and attacked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のはなんだ・・・わからんが、我々を敵として見ているのに違いないだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What was that just now... I don't know, but it's definitely treating us as enemies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっちこっちにいそうだぞ、用心して進もう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It looks like there are more of them around. Let's proceed cautiously.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまり広くない世界だな、なるほど・・そういう仕組みか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not a very large world. I see... so that's how it works.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小さな元の世界と繋がった穴がある、それは各コンピューターが開けている穴
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are holes connected to the small original world; those holes are opened by each computer.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たぶん、この近くあっても遠いゼスやヘルマンからの穴かもしれない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Probably holes leading from Zeth and Herman, which are far away even if nearby here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ようは距離を超えた空間なので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In short, it's a space that transcends distance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この変な生き物が荷物を穴かな穴へ運ぶ事で情報伝達をしていようだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These strange creatures seem to be transporting cargo through the holes to transmit information.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それをあのモンスターが襲って破壊しているので情報が伝わらなかったり、壊れたりするのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because that monster attacks and destroys them, the information may not get through or gets corrupted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パケットを１匹捕まえた、中の箱を開けてみた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I caught one packet and tried opening the box inside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ字が浮かび上がってきたぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What is this? Words are appearing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ｆｒｏｍ　リーザス帝国
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: from Rizas Empire

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ｔｏ　　　総統府
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to the Headquarters

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍事情報、今の兵力、どの地点で戦いがあるとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Military information: current troop strength, locations of battles, and so on...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごい量のデータ、ほう・・こういうデータが流れているのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An incredible amount of data. Hmm... So this kind of data is flowing here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別の一匹を捕まえてみる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I caught another one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ｆｒｏｍ　マジノライン第６地区、第１７砲台
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: from Maginot Line District 6, 17th Battery

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ｔｏ　　　ゼス司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to Zeth Command Headquarters

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 定期報告　１＝破損　２＝破損　３＝情報取れず　４＝情報取れず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Regular report: 1=Damaged, 2=Damaged, 3=No info obtained, 4=No info obtained

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸ月ｘｘ日、ＸＸＸ時ＸＸＸ分ＸＸＸ秒
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: XX month xx day, XXX hour XXX minute XXX second

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、なんかどうでもいいのもあるな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, some of this seems trivial.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別のパケットを捕まえた、中を覗こうとしたら開かない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I caught another packet; when I tried to peek inside, it wouldn't open.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは開かないな、パスワードを要求されてだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This one won't open; it's asking for a password.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむむ、わからん。ぽい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, I don't understand. Seems like it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここはなんだ、大量の箱が積んで居るぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What is this place? There is a huge stack of boxes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 開けてみるとハイパービルのとある部屋の写真、同じ写真がいっぱい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When opened, it’s a photo of a certain room in the Hyper Building, many copies of the same photo.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだこれは・・・日付が書いている事が分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What is this... I can tell there are dates written on them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしかしてこれその日の写真ですかね、３０分置にありますよ、何年分もあるのでしょうかすごい量です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could these be photos from each day? They're taken every 30 minutes. I wonder if this is data spanning years; it's an amazing amount.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでこんなのを置いているんだ、意味不明だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why keep something like this here? It makes no sense.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、これは別の場所の写真だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, this is a photo of another location.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールの過去が分かります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It reveals Pyarr's past.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姉ルートの話、姉の為に魔人になった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The story of the sister route; he became a demon for his sister.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日記はすごい量です、こんなの読んでられないと思ったらまとめデータがあった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is an enormous amount of diary entries. Just when I thought I couldn't read all of this, there was summary data.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールの過去が分かります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It reveals Pyarr's past.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姉を復活させる為の試行錯誤、コンピューター、サイバーワールドと繋げたのもパイアール
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The trials and errors to resurrect his sister, and also connecting to the computer and Cyber World were done by Pyarr.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールの最新日記
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pyarr's latest diary entry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最近、人類が使っているデータ量が増えた、ある程度は許容していたが邪魔だから排除する事にした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Recently, the amount of data humans use has increased. To some extent, I tolerated it, but since it's troublesome, I decided to eliminate it.
